description: Snow sprays in every direction. It is waist deep. You couldn't feel more at home. Crafted for exceptional days and the highest standards, the Blackcomb Eco long sleeve base layer top with hood and face mask delivers optimal moisture management and warmth with seamless style. For outdoor days when intensity is a given. A long sleeve with performance baked in, ready to go at a moment's notice.
name: Odlo Blackcomb Eco LS Top w/ Facemask - Mens
